name: Dungeonz (Korotkiewicz)
description:
A game I made in about 3 months, for a programming competition. It's written from scratch in C++ using SFML. Despite that it's quite feature rich. It has:

  • Multiple Enemies
  • Stats
  • Leveling Up
  • Inventory Items
  • Spells
  • Traps
  • Final Boss
  • Checkpoints

I was told it's somewhat hard. It's definitely possible to finish. I've done that many times. 

The source code is available here. Though it's not much to look at. 

Hope you enjoy.
